name: Try not die!
description:
Controls: left/right arrows to move, space to jump, space 2x to double jump
Your objective in this game is complete the 12 levels, the things can be more hard after you die.
This is my first developed game, it is a simple game who I maked to learning about game dev, feel free to download the game or donate if you like the game and want to encourage me to develop more games.
